name: Start at NOTHING - Ghost RPG
description:
Small RPG made originally solo for Ludum Dare 45 Game Jam.  This is an enhanced  version with audio, animations, combat skills and 9 different endings.

Can you escape from your afterlife? It might take more tries than one...

Use mouse or WASD to control.  Use the button in bottom right corner to switch to fullscreen.

Original compo version
